TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataFormats extends System.Object
public ref class DataFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組預先定義的資料格式名稱，這些名稱可用以識別剪貼簿或拖放作業中可用的資料格式。

span.span: Provides a set of predefined data format names that can be used to identify data formats available in the clipboard or drag-and-drop operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其他類別的實作介面使用的是已定義靜態格式來描述每個資料物件中儲存的資料格式。The class and other classes that implement the interface use the static formats defined by to describe each data format that is stored in a data object. 資料物件通常用於將系統剪貼簿，並在拖放作業中的資料傳輸。Data objects are typically used for transferring data to and from the system clipboard, and in drag-and-drop operations. 下表列出所提供的格式的靜態資料欄位的值。The following table lists the values of the static data format fields provided by . 這些欄位的值可供僅供參考之用;一般情況下，程式碼應該一律參考適當的欄位，而不是硬式編碼的字串。These field values are provided for informational purposes only; in general, code should always refer to the appropriate field, rather than hard-coded strings. |欄位Field|欄位值Field Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------|-----------------| ||「 點陣圖 」"Bitmap"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 點陣圖資料格式。Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.| ||"CSV""CSV"|指定逗號分隔值 (CSV) 資料格式。Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.| ||"DeviceIndependentBitmap""DeviceIndependentBitmap"|指定裝置獨立點陣圖 (DIB) 資料格式。Specifies the device-independent bitmap (DIB) data format.| ||"DataInterchangeFormat""DataInterchangeFormat"|指定 Windows 資料交換格式 (DIF) 資料格式。Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.| ||「 EnhancedMetafile""EnhancedMetafile"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 加強型中繼檔格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.| ||"FileDrop""FileDrop"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 檔案置放格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.| ||「 HTML 格式 」"HTML Format"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.| ||「 地區設定 」"Locale"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 地區設定 (文化特性 (Culture)) 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] locale (culture) data format.| ||"MetaFilePict""MetaFilePict"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 中繼檔圖片資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.| ||「 OEMText""OEMText"|指定標準 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM 文字資料格式。Specifies the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] OEM text data format.| ||「 調色盤""Palette"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 調色盤資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] palette data format.| ||「 PenData""PenData"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 畫筆資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] pen data format.| ||「 RiffAudio""RiffAudio"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音訊資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.| ||「 Rich Text 格式 」"Rich Text Format"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.| ||"PersistentObject""PersistentObject"|指定用以封裝任何型別之可序列化資料物件的資料格式。Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.| ||"System.String""System.String"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 字串類別資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] string class data format.| ||「 SymbolicLink""SymbolicLink"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符號連結資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.| ||「 文字 」"Text"|指定 ANSI 文字資料格式。Specifies the ANSI text data format.| ||"TaggedImageFileFormat""TaggedImageFileFormat"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.| ||「 UnicodeText""UnicodeText"|指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文字資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.| ||「 WaveAudio""WaveAudio"|指定 Wave 音訊資料格式。Specifies the wave audio data format.| ||"Xaml""Xaml"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.| ||"XamlPackage""XamlPackage"|指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 封裝資料格式。Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] package data format.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Bitmap As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win] (~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 點陣圖資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] bitmap data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖表示電腦圖形為記憶體中的位元陣列，而這些位元代表屬性的映像中的個別像素。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CommaSeparatedValue As String

summary.span: 指定逗號分隔值 (CSV) 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a comma-separated value (CSV) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式是常用的試算表基本交換格式。This format is a basic interchange format commonly used by spreadsheets. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dib As String

summary.span: 指定 DIB 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the DIB data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DIB 是設計是為了確保可以載入並顯示在另一個應用程式完全它們是出現在原始的應用程式的方式使用一個應用程式所建立的點陣圖形檔格式。DIB is a file format designed to ensure that bitmapped graphics created using one application can be loaded and displayed in another application exactly the way they appeared in the originating application. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dif As String

summary.span: 指定 Windows 資料交換格式 (DIF) 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the Windows Data Interchange Format (DIF) data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 差異是 ASCII 碼可以簡化其使用與傳輸到其他程式化資料庫、 試算表，以及相似的文件所組成的格式。DIF is a format consisting of ASCII codes in which database, spreadsheet, and similar documents can be structured to facilitate their use by and transfer to other programs. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnhancedMetafile As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin] (~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 加強型中繼檔格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] enhanced metafile format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增強型中繼檔格式是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]儲存圖形影像的檔案物件而不是像素為單位。The enhanced metafile format is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FileDrop As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin] (~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 檔案置放格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] file drop format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此格式與 shell 檔案拖曳互動拖放作業期間。Use this format to interact with shell file drags during drag-and-drop operations. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for a specified data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (id As Integer) As DataFormat

param.name: id
param.span: 要求 物件之資料格式的數值 ID。

span.span: The numeric ID of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所要的資料格式是由數值 ID 所指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by numeric ID.

returns.span: 物件，這個物件包含所要求之資料格式的數值 ID 與名稱。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DataFormat GetDataFormat(string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataFormat (format As String) As DataFormat

param.name: format
param.span: 要求 物件之資料格式的名稱。

span.span: The name of the data format to request a object for.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件會定義指定之資料格式的名稱與數值 ID。

span.span: Returns a object that defines a name and numeric ID for the specified data format.

summary.span: 所要的資料格式是由名稱 (字串) 所指定。

span.span: The desired data format is specified by name (a string).

returns.span: 物件，這個物件包含所要求之資料格式的數值 ID 與名稱。

span.span: A object that contains the numeric ID and the name of the requested data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法也可用來註冊新的格式。This method can also be used to register new formats. 如果找不到指定的格式，它會自動註冊為新的資料格式。If the specified format cannot be found, it is automatically registered as a new data format. 使用此方法需要呼叫端具有與 Use of this method requires that the caller have with the 設定旗標。flag set. 下列程式碼顯示的屬性語法來要求此組件的權限。The following code shows the attribute syntax to request this permission for an assembly. ```csharp [assembly: SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.RequestMinimum, Flags = UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard)] ``` ```vb ```

span.span: is .

permission.span: 針對存取低階的 unmanaged 程式碼支援剪貼簿格式的註冊。

span.span: for accessing low-level unmanaged code that supports the registration of clipboard formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Html As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html] (~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MetafilePicture As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin] (~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 中繼檔圖片資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] metafile picture data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼檔圖片格式會是儲存影像的圖形物件，而不是像素為單位的 Windows 檔案。The metafile picture format is a Windows file that stores an image in terms of graphic objects rather than pixels. 重新調整大小時，中繼檔將保存優於點陣圖的影像。When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 畫筆資料包含畫筆筆劃手寫軟體。 pen data consists of pen strokes for handwriting software. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Riff As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff] (~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] 音訊資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_riff](~/includes/tlasharptla-riff-md.md)] audio data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_riff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-riff-md.md)] 是完備的規格，專門用於中定義為不同的多媒體檔案類型的標準格式。 is a broad-based specification, designed to be used in defining standard formats for different types of multimedia files. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf] (~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_rtf](~/includes/tlasharptla-rtf-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RTF 是用於傳送的文件內容架構調格式化應用程式之間的文字文件。RTF is an adaptation of Document Content Architecture that is used for transferring formatted text documents between applications. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 指定用以封裝任何型別之可序列化資料物件的資料格式。

span.span: Specifies a data format that encapsulates any type of serializable data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SymbolicLink As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin] (~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 符號連結資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] symbolic link data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符號連結是磁碟目錄項目會取代檔案的目錄項目，但不是實際的不同目錄中的檔案參考。A symbolic link is a disk directory entry that takes the place of a directory entry for a file, but is actually a reference to a file in a different directory. 符號連結可能也可稱為別名、 快速鍵、 軟式連結或符號連結。A symbolic link may also be referred to an alias, shortcut, soft link, or symlink. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

summary.span: 指定 ANSI 文字資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the ANSI text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Tiff As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff] (~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_tiff](~/includes/tla2sharptla-tiff-md.md)] 是以標準檔案格式通常用於掃描、 存放裝置，以及交換的灰階圖形影像。 is a standard file format commonly used for scanning, storage, and interchanges of gray-scale graphic images. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UnicodeText As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode] (~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 文字資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] text data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此資料格式表示 16 位元的字元編碼的 Unicode，也稱為 utf-16，與 ucs-2。This data format denotes 16-bit character encoded Unicode, also referred to as UTF-16, and UCS-2. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Xaml As String

summary.span: 指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml] (~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 資料格式。

span.span: Specifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] data format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 是用來代表物件的樹狀結構的 XML 架構語言。XAML is an XML-based language used to represent a tree of objects. 這些物件所產生的事件可以使用任何處理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]程式設計語言。Events generated by these objects can be handled using any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] programming language. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常用來說明使用者介面 (UI)、 文件和媒體經驗。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is typically used to describe user interfaces (UI), documents, and media experiences. 這個欄位由類別和其他類別的實作介面，以描述可用的資料格式。This field is used by the class and other classes that implement the interface to describe an available data format. 使用此欄位與方法，將對應格式的資料加入到資料的物件; 使用此欄位與方法來擷取對應格式的資料。Use this field with the method to add data with a corresponding format to a data object; use this field with the method to retrieve data in the corresponding format. 若要檢查的資料物件是否包含在這種格式的資料，請使用方法來查詢的格式。To check whether a data object contains data in this format, use the method to query for the format.
